posts.post_title: T206 Snodgrass SGC moved to Ebay
posts.post_content:
Dont have a scanner, dont remember how much I paid or how to price a SGC Authentic example:) I know nobody likes to see "make an offer".

Michael

Moved to Ebay!

Ends tonight.
